item.title: Shops work but it's impossible to buy stuff
item.dc:creator: @Antonio23 Antonio23
item.description:
@Antonio23 wrote:

I have a problem. I made some shops in my game.
I can open the shop screen and the items are in shop with the amount, but the price isn’t set. So when u value a thing the client loses connection and restarts.
My shop script looks like this:

case 1917: //bandit p.viewings = 1; p.shopid = 1; p.frames.showInterface(p, 278); p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop1, p.shop1n); p.frames.setString(p, " The general armour shop<img=0>", 278, 88);
The price is in p.shop1p.

Read full topic
item.source: Shops work but it's impossible to buy stuff
